00033 struct sim_event // only one type of event: WRITE COMPLETED
00034 {
00035     int_type timestamp;
00036     int_type iblock;
00037     inline sim_event(int_type t, int_type b) : timestamp(t), iblock(b) { };
00038 };
00039 
00040 struct sim_event_cmp : public std::binary_function<sim_event, sim_event, bool>
00041 {
00042     inline bool operator ()  (const sim_event & a, const sim_event & b) const
00043     {
00044         return a.timestamp > b.timestamp;
00045     }
00046 };
00047 
00048 int_type simulate_async_write(
00049     int * disks,
00050     const int_type L,
00051     const int_type m_init,
00052     const int_type D,
00053     std::pair<int_type, int_type> * o_time);
00054 
00055 typedef std::pair<int_type, int_type> write_time_pair;
00056 struct write_time_cmp : public std::binary_function<write_time_pair, write_time_pair, bool>
00057 {
00058     inline bool operator ()  (const write_time_pair & a, const write_time_pair & b) const
00059     {
00060         return a.second > b.second;
00061     }
00062 };
00063 
00064 void compute_prefetch_schedule(
00065     int_type * first,
00066     int_type * last,
00067     int_type * out_first,
00068     int_type m,
00069     int_type D);

00071 template <typename run_type>
00072 void simulate_async_write(
00073     const run_type & input,
00074     const int_type m_init,
00075     const int_type D,
00076     std::pair<int_type, int_type> * o_time)
00077 {
00078     typedef std::priority_queue<sim_event, std::vector<sim_event>, sim_event_cmp> event_queue_type;
00079     typedef std::queue<int_type> disk_queue_type;
00080 
00081     const int_type L = input.size();
00082     assert(L >= D);
00083     disk_queue_type * disk_queues = new disk_queue_type[L];
00084     event_queue_type event_queue;
00085 
00086     int_type m = m_init;
00087     int_type i = L - 1;
00088     int_type oldtime = 0;
00089     bool * disk_busy = new bool [D];
00090 
00091     while (m && (i >= 0))
00092     {
00093         int_type disk = input[i].bid.storage->get_disk_number();
00094         disk_queues[disk].push(i);
00095         i--;
00096         m--;
00097     }
00098 
00099     for (int_type ii = 0; ii < D; ii++)
00100         if (!disk_queues[ii].empty())
00101         {
00102             int_type j = disk_queues[ii].front();
00103             disk_queues[ii].pop();
00104             event_queue.push(sim_event(1, j));
00105         }
00106 
00107     while (!event_queue.empty())
00108     {
00109         sim_event cur = event_queue.top();
00110         event_queue.pop();
00111         if (oldtime != cur.timestamp)
00112         {
00113             // clear disk_busy
00114             for (int_type i = 0; i < D; i++)
00115                 disk_busy[i] = false;
00116 
00117 
00118             oldtime = cur.timestamp;
00119         }
00120         o_time[cur.iblock] = std::pair < int_type, int_type > (cur.iblock, cur.timestamp + 1);
00121 
00122         m++;
00123         if (i >= 0)
00124         {
00125             m--;
00126             int_type disk = input[i].bid.storage->get_disk_number();
00127             if (disk_busy[disk])
00128             {
00129                 disk_queues[disk].push(i);
00130             }
00131             else
00132             {
00133                 event_queue.push(sim_event(cur.timestamp + 1, i));
00134                 disk_busy[disk] = true;
00135             }
00136 
00137             i--;
00138         }
00139 
00140         // add next block to write
00141         int_type disk = input[cur.iblock].bid.storage->get_disk_number();
00142         if (!disk_busy[disk] && !disk_queues[disk].empty())
00143         {
00144             event_queue.push(sim_event(cur.timestamp + 1, disk_queues[disk].front()));
00145             disk_queues[disk].pop();
00146             disk_busy[disk] = true;
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     delete [] disk_busy;
00151     delete [] disk_queues;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 template <typename run_type>
00156 void compute_prefetch_schedule(
00157     const run_type & input,
00158     int_type * out_first,
00159     int_type m,
00160     int_type D)
00161 {
00162     typedef std::pair<int_type, int_type>  pair_type;
00163     const int_type L = input.size();
00164     if (L <= D)
00165     {
00166         for (int_type i = 0; i < L; ++i)
00167             out_first[i] = i;
00168 
00169         return;
00170     }
00171     pair_type * write_order = new pair_type[L];
00172 
00173     simulate_async_write(input, m, D, write_order);
00174 
00175     std::stable_sort(write_order, write_order + L, write_time_cmp());
00176 
00177     for (int_type i = 0; i < L; i++)
00178         out_first[i] = write_order[i].first;
00179 
00180 
00181     delete [] write_order;
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 template <typename bid_iterator_type>
00186 void simulate_async_write(
00187     bid_iterator_type input,
00188     const int_type L,
00189     const int_type m_init,
00190     const int_type /*D*/,
00191     std::pair<int_type, int_type> * o_time)
00192 {
00193     typedef std::priority_queue<sim_event, std::vector<sim_event>, sim_event_cmp> event_queue_type;
00194     typedef std::queue<int_type> disk_queue_type;
00195 
00196     //disk_queue_type * disk_queues = new disk_queue_type[L];
00197 #ifndef BOOST_MSVC
00198     typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map<int, disk_queue_type> disk_queues_type;
00199 #else
00200     typedef stdext::hash_map<int, disk_queue_type> disk_queues_type;
00201 #endif
00202     disk_queues_type disk_queues;
00203     event_queue_type event_queue;
00204 
00205     int_type m = m_init;
00206     int_type i = L - 1;
00207     int_type oldtime = 0;
00208     //bool * disk_busy = new bool [D];
00209 #ifndef BOOST_MSVC
00210     __gnu_cxx::hash_set<int> disk_busy;
00211 #else
00212     stdext::hash_set<int> disk_busy;
00213 #endif
00214 
00215     while (m && (i >= 0))
00216     {
00217         int_type disk = (*(input + i)).storage->get_disk_number();
00218         disk_queues[disk].push(i);
00219         i--;
00220         m--;
00221     }
00222 
00223     /*
00224        for(int_type i=0;i<D;i++)
00225             if(!disk_queues[i].empty())
00226             {
00227                     int_type j = disk_queues[i].front();
00228                     disk_queues[i].pop();
00229                     event_queue.push(sim_event(1,j));
00230             }
00231      */
00232     disk_queues_type::iterator it = disk_queues.begin();
00233     for ( ; it != disk_queues.end(); ++it)
00234     {
00235         int_type j = (*it).second.front();
00236         (*it).second.pop();
00237         event_queue.push(sim_event(1, j));
00238     }
00239 
00240     while (!event_queue.empty())
00241     {
00242         sim_event cur = event_queue.top();
00243         event_queue.pop();
00244         if (oldtime != cur.timestamp)
00245         {
00246             // clear disk_busy
00247             //for(int_type i=0;i<D;i++)
00248             //  disk_busy[i] = false;
00249             disk_busy.clear();
00250 
00251             oldtime = cur.timestamp;
00252         }
00253         o_time[cur.iblock] = std::pair < int_type, int_type > (cur.iblock, cur.timestamp + 1);
00254 
00255         m++;
00256         if (i >= 0)
00257         {
00258             m--;
00259             int_type disk = (*(input + i)).storage->get_disk_number();
00260             if (disk_busy.find(disk) != disk_busy.end())
00261             {
00262                 disk_queues[disk].push(i);
00263             }
00264             else
00265             {
00266                 event_queue.push(sim_event(cur.timestamp + 1, i));
00267                 disk_busy.insert(disk);
00268             }
00269 
00270             i--;
00271         }
00272 
00273         // add next block to write
00274         int_type disk = (*(input + cur.iblock)).storage->get_disk_number();
00275         if (disk_busy.find(disk) == disk_busy.end() && !disk_queues[disk].empty())
00276         {
00277             event_queue.push(sim_event(cur.timestamp + 1, disk_queues[disk].front()));
00278             disk_queues[disk].pop();
00279             disk_busy.insert(disk);
00280         }
00281     }
00282 
00283     //delete [] disk_busy;
00284     //delete [] disk_queues;
00285 }

00287 
00288 template <typename bid_iterator_type>
00289 void compute_prefetch_schedule(
00290     bid_iterator_type input_begin,
00291     bid_iterator_type input_end,
00292     int_type * out_first,
00293     int_type m,
00294     int_type D)
00295 {
00296     typedef std::pair<int_type, int_type>  pair_type;
00297     const int_type L = input_end - input_begin;
00298     STXXL_VERBOSE1("compute_prefetch_schedule: sequence length=" << L << " disks=" << D);
00299     if (L <= D)
00300     {
00301         for (int_type i = 0; i < L; ++i)
00302             out_first[i] = i;
00303 
00304         return;
00305     }
00306     pair_type * write_order = new pair_type[L];
00307 
00308     simulate_async_write(input_begin, L, m, D, write_order);
00309 
00310     std::stable_sort(write_order, write_order + L, write_time_cmp());
00311 
00312     STXXL_VERBOSE1("Computed prefetch order for " << L << " blocks with " <<
00313                    D << " disks and " << m << " blocks");
00314     for (int_type i = 0; i < L; i++)
00315     {
00316         out_first[i] = write_order[i].first;
00317         STXXL_VERBOSE1(write_order[i].first);
00318     }
00319 
00320     delete [] write_order;
00321 }
